title: Bloomberg Markets: Llamas on the Wait for iPhone X Delivery
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Llamas on the Wait for iPhone X Delivery
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Ramon Llamas\u0010Research Manager for Wearables and Mobile Phones\u0010International Data Corp (IDC)\u0010Discussing Apple selling out of the iPhone X within minutes of accepting orders and consumers facing as many as six weeks before delivery.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
